knimeNode.name: GoogleMetrics
knimeNode.shortDescription: Google Metrics, ImpressiveCode DePress Plugin Framework.

fullDescription.intro: This node can be used to read data from Google CodePro AnalitiX Metrics entries file.
fullDescription.p: Google CodePro AnalytiX Metrics is an automated tool that measure and report on key quality indicators in a body of Java source code.
To get file needed in this plugin, run Google CodePro plugin in Eclipse with your project code and after running Code Metrics, right click on one of the results and choose export to a xml file.

Please check workflow examples here.
Copyright (c) ImpressiveCode, DePress Project
fullDescription.option: Enter a valid file. When you press ENTER, the file is analyzed and the settings pre-set. You can also choose a previously read file from the drop-down list, or select a file from the "Browse..." dialog.

ports.outPort: Datatable just read from the GoogleMetrics entries file
